About me

I am a junior at Emory University where I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's of Science in Mathematics and Computer Science as well as a minor in Business. I recently completed an internship in machine learning where my focus was to build a model to perform a sentiment analysis.

I am a member of the Emory Men's Golf Team to which I dedicate much of my time. In my free time I like to play chess and poker or go visit some local restaurants.

Projects and Certifications

Sentiment Analysis Model

I created an LSTM model using open source python libraries such as sklearn, keras, and NLTK to perform a sentiment analysis on product reviews.

Source Code

Using JDBC, I formulated queries to perform searches on a database containing artists, songs, albums, etc.
